definition: colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: If the number reaches the ground, life will be deducted.
sentences.chinese: 數目字擊落地面則會被扣除生命。

sentences.english: He feels certain Japan will attempt a shootdown.
sentences.chinese: 他確信日本會嘗試擊落該火箭。

sentences.english: Shoot down the zombies overrunning your house before they get to you in this horror shooting game.
sentences.chinese: 擊落殭屍超越你的房子，才讓你在這恐怖的射擊遊戲。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabian officials have not responded to the shootdown claim.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯官員沒有對直升機被擊落的說法做出迴應。

sentences.english: Three enemy planes were disposed of by us .
Seals' copter shot down by Taliban rocket.
sentences.chinese: 美國海豹直升機被塔利班擊落。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the US has been developing an alternative system to shoot down short and medium-range missiles.
sentences.chinese: 同時，美國已經在發展另一種擊落中短程導彈的系統。

sentences.english: The horseman who knocks off the last piece of wood will get a prize cup and a wreath will put around the horse's neck.
sentences.chinese: 擊落最後一片木塊的騎士獲得獎盃，馬也給帶上花環。

sentences.english: Our battery accounted for three enemy planes.
sentences.chinese: 我們炮兵連擊落了三架敵機。

sentences.english: They were on their first overseas assignment when the shootdown occurred.
sentences.chinese: 他們是在海外執行第一項任務時被擊落的。

sentences.english: A number of enemy planes were brought down the moment they intruded into our territorial air.
sentences.chinese: 許多敵機一侵入我們的領空就被擊落。

sentences.english: The U. S. pilots have downed several enemy jets in the war.
sentences.chinese: 在戰場美國飛行員擊落數架敵人的飛機。

sentences.english: It was the first time one of the much-touted "invisible" fighters had ever been hit.
sentences.chinese: 這也是世界上首次有隱形戰機在戰爭中被擊落。

sentences.english: Pyongyang has warned such a shootdown would result in war.
sentences.chinese: 平壤警告說，擊落他們發射的衛星將意味着戰爭。

sentences.english: The hind wheel of it was shot down. And its door was off the hinges.
sentences.chinese: 它的後輪被擊落，而且它的門也跟合頁脫開了。

definition: North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
military aircraft/secret plan/Privy Council during the Qing dynasty
to test-fire/to conduct a missile test
